text: Arr훮 no masujido wa, hitasura korera no mono (shinja) ni yotte kanri sa rerubekidearu. (Sunawachi) arr훮 to sh큰matsu no hi o shinji, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o nashi, arr훮 igai no nanimono o mo osorenai mono dakedearu. Korera no mono wa, tadashiku michibika reru mono to narudearou
